overview:
Rachel Hannah is the Senior Director of Human Resources at PlayFirst and is responsible for very important assets to the company - the employees. She is responsible for leading the Human Resources department along with supporting the creative culture at PlayFirst that enables its employees to thrive, grow and continue to make chart-topping games. Hannah brings over 10 years of Human Resources and Recruiting experience to PlayFirst. Prior to joining PlayFirst, Hannah spent many years in the animation industry, specifically at Pixar Animation Studios, where she helped grow the company from its “adolescence” into the successful studio it is today.

Hannah holds a B. A. degree in psychology from San Francisco State University.
